title: Bangladesh elections: BNP leader dies at polling station after allegedly being pushed; hit head on tree
summary_full: A BNP leader died in Khulna while going to vote. Mohibuzzaman Kochi was allegedly pushed by Jamaat supporters at a polling station. He fell and hit his head. Doctors declared him dead at the hospital. The BNP has demanded immediate arrest and legal action against the Jamaat leader and his associates.
